name: CQ.User
doc:
A helper class providing information about a CQ user as well as
methods to manipulate it. Use the...

props.name: User.ADMIN
props.doc: <static> The ID of the admin user (defaults to "admin").

props.name: User.ANONYMOUS
props.doc: <static> The ID of the anonymous user (defaults to "anonymous").

props.name: User.LANGUAGE
props.doc: <static> The path to the language property in the user info (defaults to "language").

props.name: User.PLATFORM_LANGUAGE
props.doc:
<static> The path to the platform language property in the user info (defaults to
"platform...

props.name: User.PREFERENCES_PROVIDER_ID
props.doc: <static> The default ID of the preferences provider.

props.name: User.PRIVILEGES_STORE_ID
props.doc: <static> The default ID of the privileges store.

methods.name: User.getCurrentUser
methods.doc: <static> Returns an instance of the current user.

methods.name: User.getUserID
methods.doc: <static> Returns the ID of the current user.

methods.name: User.getUserName
methods.doc: <static> Returns the name of the current user.

methods.name: User.login
methods.doc: <static> Logs in with the specified user ID and password.

methods.name: getAllowedApps
methods.doc: Returns the applications the user has permission to use.

methods.name: getHome
methods.doc: Returns the home of the user.

methods.name: getLanguage
methods.doc: Returns the language selected by the user.

methods.name: getLocale
methods.doc: Returns the language selected by the user as a locale object.

methods.name: getUserID
methods.doc: Returns the ID of the user.

methods.name: getUserName
methods.doc: Returns the name of the user.

methods.name: hasPermission
methods.doc: Returns true if the user has the specified permission.

methods.name: hasPermissionOn
methods.doc:
Returns true if the user has the specified permission on a
certain path.

methods.name: isImpersonated
methods.doc: Returns true if the user is the result of impersonation.

methods.name: login
methods.doc: Logs the user in with the specified password.

methods.name: sudoAs
methods.doc: Starts impersonating the user with the specified ID.
